scripts.build: APP_NAME=$npm_package_name APP_VERSION=$npm_package_version APP_ROOT_PATH=$(pwd) yarn --cwd=node_modules/@rvohealth/psychic build && echo "building your app..." && rm -rf dist && APP_ROOT_PATH=$(pwd) npx tsc -p ./tsconfig.build.json
scripts.dev: APP_NAME=$npm_package_name APP_VERSION=$npm_package_version APP_ROOT_PATH=$(pwd) NODE_ENV=development TS_SAFE=1 WORKER_COUNT=0 ts-node --transpile-only ./src/main.ts
scripts.dev-worker: APP_NAME=$npm_package_name APP_VERSION=$npm_package_version APP_ROOT_PATH=$(pwd) NODE_ENV=development TS_SAFE=1 WORKER_COUNT=1 ts-node --transpile-only ./src/worker.ts
scripts.fspec: APP_NAME=$npm_package_name APP_VERSION=$npm_package_version APP_ROOT_PATH=$(pwd) TS_SAFE=1 jest --clearCache && jest --config=./spec/features/jest.config.js --runInBand --forceExit --verbose --logHeapUsage
scripts.console: APP_NAME=$npm_package_name APP_VERSION=$npm_package_version TS_SAFE=1 APP_ROOT_PATH=$(pwd) npx ts-node --transpile-only --project ./tsconfig.json ./src/conf/repl.ts
scripts.lint: yarn run eslint --no-warn-ignored "src/**/*.ts" "spec/**/*.ts" && yarn run prettier . --check
